ConfigurationOption.Value: select pr.vendor, c.name, c.address1, c.address2, c.address3, c.address4, pr.contact, c.phone, c.type, pr.freightterms, pr.paymentterms, pr.shipvia, pr.fob, pr.inclusive1, pr.payonreceipt, pr.inspectionrequired, pr.customernum, pr.siteid, pr.orgid, pr.prid from pr left join companies c on c.company = pr.vendor and c.orgid = pr.orgid
